description:
Maeda Atsushi is http://anidb.net/ch79466 [Sakamoto]`s former bully, and one of a three-member delinquent group. After being bested by Sakamoto, Atsushi no longer smokes, instead choosing to blow bubbles. He harbors both resentment and admiration to Sakamoto.
During the third year students` graduation ceremony, he was manipulated into attacking Sakamoto while he delivered a speech. Eventually, he gave up and voiced his jealousy towards Sakamoto and the latter covered up his attack as a part of his speech, saving him from disciplinary punishments.
Source: Wikipedia, edited.
name: Maeda Atsushi
